thread.title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens': New Poster, Teasers
thread.title_full: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens': New Poster, Teasers

title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens': New Poster, Teasers
text:
'Star Wars: The Force Awakens': New Poster, Teasers Posted just a moment ago 
LUCASFILM (NEW YORK) -- There was definitely an "awakening" this weekend. "Star Wars" dropped a few new teasers and a new poster in anticipation of the latest full trailer, set to air tonight during Monday Night Football on ESPN. 
Let's break them down. 
First the poster features a lot: new characters like Kylo Ren, Rey, BB-8; stormtroopers; Han Solo, Princess Leia, Chewbacca, C-3PO and the Millennium Falcon. 
"The dark side and the light together on the new official poster. Tune in to ESPN’s Monday Night Football tomorrow for an exclusive new look at STAR WARS: THE FORCE AWAKENS. #TheForceAwakens," the caption read on the official "Star Wars" Facebook page . 
Next, we have a few new teasers. 
One features Oscar Isaac's Poe running into John Boyega's Finn and the two look to be allies for the Rebellion. 
Another teaser features Daisy Ridley's Rey and some past footage we've already seen. —Walt Disney Studios (@DisneyStudios) October 18, 2015 
Anyone pumped for Monday night's new trailer? 
"The Force Awakens" hits theaters on Dec. 18. 
Coinciding with tonight's trailer, "tickets for the highly anticipated film will also go on sale [Monday] for showings in theaters across the globe," according to StarWars.com. There's also a list of theaters hosting a special marathon event leading up to "Episode 7." 
The full list is on StarWars.com. 
The Walt Disney Co. is the parent company of ABC News.
